name: Holy Inspiration
description:
Inspire the target unit.
Villagers
- gather resources 1% faster.

name: Maneuvre Arrow
description:
Fire a Signal Arrow that increases the movement speed of nearby units (including the Khan) by +1% tiles/s for 5% seconds.
Does not afffect villagers.

name: Attack Move
description:
Unit moves to target position attacking enemies they encounter along the way.
Using Attack Move on an enemy building or unit directly attacks that target.

name: Automatic Tax Collection (On)
description: Stops the Imperial Official from automatically collecting taxes.

name: Collect Tax
description: Orders the Official to collect from a building that has accumulated tax (Gold).

name: Delete Building
description:
Destroy this building.
No resources are refunded when destroying a building in this way.
Cannot destroy this building if enemies are nearby.

name: Delete Unit
description:
Destroy this unit.
No resources are refunded when destroying a unit in this way.

name: Drop-off Tax
description: (Left-click on a Town Center to drop-off the gold collected by the Imperial Official)

name: Emergency Repairs
description: Building repairs itself by 1% health every 2% second for 3% seconds.

name: Garrison
description: Orders Units to enter target building or transport.

name: Herd Sheep to Building
description:
Any Sheep following the Scout will wait at the targeted building or follow the targeted Scout.
Villagers can harvest Sheep for Food.

name: Line Formation (On)
description: Return to a tight Regular Formation.

name: Pack Up
description: Allows this structure to move to another location.

name: Rally Point
description:
Issues a Rally Point order.
Rally Point orders are given to units when they are produced.
You can queue multiple Rally Points by holding Shift and issuing additional Rally Point orders.
If a unit cannot be given the desired order it will move there instead.

name: Repair
description: Repair damaged buildings, walls, naval vessels, or siege engines.

name: Return All to Work
description: Returns all Villagers seeking shelter back to their previous task or location.

name: Return to Work
description: Returns Villagers garrisoned in this structure back to their previous task or location.

name: Scouting Falcon
description: Release a falcon that provides vision in the area for 1% seconds.

name: Seek Shelter
description: Orders the Villager to automatically seek shelter in the nearest garrisonable building.

name: Spear Wall
description: Spearmen automatically form spearwalls to brace against incoming charges.

name: Staggered Formation (On)
description: Return to a tight Regular Formation.

name: Stand Ground (On)
description:
Unit is currently Standing Ground.
Click to return it to normal behavior.
Units Standing Ground attack enemies within range but do not chase unless ordered to attack.
A unit that is Standing Ground is impassable for both allies and enemies.

name: Stop
description: Orders units to stop their current actions.

name: Supervise
description:
The Official supervises a building, making it produce 1% faster.
Resource drop off buildings receive 2% more resources.

name: Switch to Lodya Transport Ship
description: Transforms the ship into a Lodya Transport Ship.

name: Ungarrison All
description: Orders all garrisoned units to exit this building or transport.

name: Unload Garrison
description: Unloads all squads in garrison at target position.

name: Unpack

name: Wedge Formation (On)
description: Return to a tight Regular Formation.

name: Maneuvre Arrow
description: Speed increased by 1%.

name: Golden Age
description:
Structures built within House of Wisdom influence area help progress to the Golden Age.
Structure Count: 1COUNT%/2TOTAL%

name: Golden Age Tier I
description: Villager gathering rate +1% for all resources.

name: Golden Age Tier II
description:
Villager gathering rate +1% for all resources.
Research speeds +2%

name: Golden Age Tier III
description:
Villager gathering rate +1% for all resources.
Research speeds +2% Production speeds +3%

name: Holy Inspiration
description:
Inspire the unit.
Villagers
- gather resources 1% faster.

name: Hunter's Boon
description:
Rus units that earn a hunting bounty for killing animals.
After reaching certain thresholds of total bounty, Rus Villagers receive a global increase to their harvest rate of Food.
The rate at which Hunting Cabins provide Gold to players also speeds up.
100 Bounty Total = +10% Food Harvest Rate & Hunting Cabins now generate Gold every 27s.
200 Bounty Total = +20% Food Harvest Rate & Hunting Cabins now generate Gold every 24s.
500 Bounty Total = +30% Food Harvest Rate & Hunting Cabins now generate Gold every 18s.

name: Hunter's Boon Tier I
description: 1% Bounty Total = +2% Food Harvest Rate & Hunting Cabins now generate Gold every 3%s.

name: Hunter's Boon Tier II
description: 1% Bounty Total = +2% Food Harvest Rate & Hunting Cabins now generate Gold every 3%s.

name: Hunter's Boon Tier III
description: 1% Bounty Total = +2% Food Harvest Rate & Hunting Cabins now generate Gold every 3%s.

name: Hunting Bounty
description:
Rus units earn a bounty of Gold for any animal they kill.
Sheep
- 1% Gold Deer
- 2% Gold Wolf
- 3% Gold Boar
- 4% Gold

name: House of Wisdom Influence
description:
Buildings within influence gain +1% Fire Armor.
Structures built within House of Wisdom influence area help progress to the Golden Age.

name: Mill Influence
description: Farm harvest rate increased +1%/+2%/+3%/+4% by Age while within the influence of a Mill.

name: Mosque Influence
description: Research buildings within influence have the research rate increased for garrisoned scholars.

name: Network of Castles
description: When enemies are nearby, this building sounds an alarm, causing nearby units to get a +1% increase to attack speed.

name: Ovoo Influence

name: Town Center Influence
description: Buildings gain the Emergency Repairs ability.

name: Wooden Fortress Influence
description: Lumber camps and Town Centers within influence return 1% more wood.

name: Gold Generation
description:
Hunting Cabins generate Gold based on the number of nearby trees.
Placing other Hunting Cabins nearby reduces this amount, however.
Hunting Cabins generate Gold once every 1% seconds.
During this period, all Hunting Cabins together can generate a maximum of 2% Gold.

name: Gold Generation Tier I
description:
Hunting Cabins generate Gold based on the number of nearby trees.
Placing other Hunting Cabins nearby reduces this amount, however.
Hunting Cabins generate Gold once every 1% seconds.
During this period, all Hunting Cabins together can generate a maximum of 2% Gold.

name: Gold Generation Tier II
description:
Hunting Cabins generate Gold based on the number of nearby trees.

Hunting Cabins generate Gold based on the number of nearby trees.

Scholars garrisoned in the Mosque are added to Active Scholars.
Active Sholars research technologies accross the civilisation.

description:
Economic support unit with no combat capability.

+ Can be tasked with improving a building’s efficiency
- Only a certain number of Officials can exist at a time

name: Villager
description:
Gathers Wood, Food, Stone, and Gold.
Builds and repairs buildings and can repair siege engines and naval units.
- Weak in combat

name: Villager

Dead Sheep provide Food that can be gathered by Villagers.\n\nYou monster.

Wolves are dangerous wild animals that attack nearly any unit that strays too near (Scouts and naval units are ignored unless provoked).
They provide no Food to gather, only death.

Traders and Trade Ships make trips between the trade target and their home Market or Dock.
\nEach time they return to their home Market or Dock, the Trader or Trade Ship deposits an amount of Gold based on the distance between the two buildings.

name: Arrow Slit
